remarks: A principle linking outsideness to betweenness.  Theorem 6.2 of [Schwabhauser] p. 43.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: btwnoutside $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) /\ ( C e. ( EE ` N ) /\ P e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( ( ( A =/= P /\ B =/= P /\ C =/= P ) /\ P Btwn <. A , C >. ) -> ( P Btwn <. B , C >. <-> P OutsideOf <. A , B >. ) ) ) $.
